original: intros x l H. induction l as [| h t IH]. - simpl. intros _. constructor. - simpl. intros H'. inversion H'. subst. clear H'. destruct t as [| h' t'] eqn:Et. + constructor. apply lmax_prop in H. lia. + destruct (lt_total x h) as [Hlt | [Heq | Hgt]]. * constructor. lia. * subst. constructor. lia. * constructor. apply IH. apply nat_sorted_cons_inv in H. apply H.
